Review.Contenu: Deceptive and sneaky business practices. In August 2022 I tried a trial for $45, and decided within 24 hours that this was not suitable for my business. They forced me to pay the entire monthly payment and refunded $7.00, along with canceling my account. Now - in NOVEMBER 2023 - they have charged me $300 and claim I didn't cancel the account. No notifications at all - just charged my credit card.  ARE YOU KIDDING?? I have disputed this with the credit card provider after their customer service refused to help.UPDATE - they still refuse to correct their bogus system that did not properly cancel a subscription that I certainly canceled in August of 2022. The next step is to notify the BBB, and file theft/fraud charges. Nobody should have money stolen from them like Circleboom did to me.They continue to be appalling. If you charge a Non User 1.5 YEARS after cancellation, they should be ashamed and just issue the refund. Is business really that bad that they have to steal? Beware of this "company".

CIRCLEBOOM ?? 🗑️👎👎👎👎👎👎👎I made an account JUST to illustrate how insanely trash and web1.0 this waste of internet garbage is.Do not pay for anything, you will not be able to refund once you realize how horrible and useless the app is.I literally cannot believe I wasted my money.This coming from a graphic designer, UI designer and twitter user of 10+ years... trust me it is absolutely useless.Really puts anger in my heart that they don't allow refunds. Its as if they already know how useless their "product" is.DO NOT USE CIRCLEBOOM.

signed up for a trial for work.  Never used it.  Accidentally let the trial period finish and they charged me 420$.  Told them I never used the service nor will I ever use the service.  Still refuse to refund me after multiple emails.  Took them multiple emails and a week to even respond on top of that.

Biggest waste of time ever. No response to socials or emails; no right to cancel within the 14 days cooling off period - ignored. Absolutely avoid. Much easier to analyse the data using freely available tools.

Review.Titre: My experience with this service was…
Review.Contenu: My experience with this service was profoundly disappointing, bordering on deceptive. The company's blog misleadingly suggests that users have the capability to automatically remove fake followers. However, upon subscription, it becomes evident that this feature is non-existent. The only available option is to blacklist these followers, a far cry from the promised functionality.Furthermore, the user interface is exceptionally cumbersome and unintuitive, arguably one of the worst I have encountered. This frustration is compounded by a malfunctioning system. For instance, while the service allows you to utilize 'credits' to generate a CSV file, it fails utterly at providing a means to access this file. No download option is available, nor is any email link sent to retrieve it.To add to these shortcomings, the customer support is noticeably deficient. Despite reading customer emails, there is a conspicuous lack of response or assistance, leading to a feeling of being ignored and undervalued.In summary, the service not only fails to deliver on its promises but also provides a user experience that is deeply unsatisfactory, to the extent that it feels misleading and untrustworthy.

Signed up and paid to use the unlike tweets feature but they don’t tell you that it’s rate limited by Twitter API to 100 unlikes per day, which is very slow. Also no refunds even I only paid for that feature that it’s not useful at that rate…UPDATE: I cancelled the renewal with still 3 weeks of the current plan left to use it (at least, since I paid the whole month and they don't refund) but suddenly the app has stopped working and support doesn't reply. Avoid at all costs.

Avoid it!!! The Customer Service is zero! I asked for a refund for a month and the reply I received was : "Like any other SaaS Business , including Netflix, unfortunately, all subscriptions are non-refundable". After receiving this message I ask further questions, but no one replied to me.  All they want is money!

Review.Titre: BEWARE: Cancel your subscription quick! No refunds
Review.Contenu: An honest company would notify you that you will be charged again the next month. They get you on a subscription for a feature that you only need to use once and of course won't refund you if you unintentionally left the subscription active because you were waiting for all the likes to be deleted.
Free subscriptions never run out , they are no use anyway . What a company , lies after lies . Promises based on financial extraction , how they aren't investigated by the authorities , well !

I purchased both Circle-Boom products but after purchasing them Friday morning both don't work.Customer support is really bad as they make out there is no problem.I asked for a refund or to get the Twitter API working but now I had to call my bank for a chargeback.Avoid it completely as it no longer works.

Doesn't work and is terrible. Avoid. All access to twitter API for purposes of your own account should be free and automatic. This is horrible. I just want API access not some stupid ecosystem of terrible analytics companies.Charge for follower growth not basic account management.

Review.Titre: BUYER BEWARE no unfollowing and no refunds!
Review.Contenu: BUYER BEWARE this service does not offer mass unfollowing (the only reason I bought it) and all subscriptions are non-refundable. They really should have made this much clearer early on, as there are tons of articles scattered across the web that claim it does mass unfollowing (it no longer does due to Twitter TOS). It's insane to me that they don't offer refunds for users who will literally never use the service without that critical feature. I learned a $72 lesson today.

Horrifying experience with this awful company. I paid for a full year subscription to this platform. After two months of using the subscription they removed one of the MAIN functions of the platform which made my year-long membership obsolete. I contacted them to request a refund for the remaining months I'd already paid for as I no longer needed their services if they no longer offered the feature that I needed. They refused to refund me. I could not get in contact with anyone at Circleboom except through an email thread. There is no working phone number at all and the representatives are useless. I finally got the Better Business Bureau involved as well as my credit card company who were able to get me my refund. This company is full of fraudsters. I would NEVER recommend. Just awful.

Review.Titre: Continued taking my money for a product that I had stopped using.
Review.Contenu: I signed up to this product when working for a charity a number of years ago. When I left, Circleboom kept charging me for the service though I no longer used it, and the cost went up and up. I recently discovered I was still paying for it even though I have not used it for years and of course the company won't give me any money back. Be really careful when you sign up for this product as they will carry on taking your money and never send you anything to let you know that your are still paying for it. Scammy and extortionate, don't care about their customers, avoid at all costs.
What total bs. Went to the trouble of signing up for this stupid thing only to find out that *no* aspect of it is free and you have to pay for service before it does anything at all. How do I cancel?
Terrible, terrible, terrible. The program itself is faulty and hard to navigate, but the customer service leaves much more to be desired. Seems more like a scam site to me.

This application advertises several help tutorials on how to mass remove your Twitter followers. The application actually doesn't have this functionality anymore. Complete bait and switch tactic. No way to get refund either. Too scammy for my tastes. Would not recommend.

Review.Titre: They just sent me an email today asking…
Review.Contenu: They just sent me an email today asking me to review them for $50 so I did :)Makes me wonder if they bought all those other reviews.

Review.Titre: The service was buggy from the…
Review.Contenu: The service was buggy from the beginning and then their support team decided to make a false assumption that the accounts I was trying to include in the service included content featuring people who are underage.

Review.Titre: No refund even when the product does not work.
Review.Contenu: Premium features stopped working and the support is unwilling to fix the problem or issue a refund.

They claim to be able to do things like delete tweets or unlike them on a large scale, but once you buy the pro account and try to use it, Circleboom doesn't do what was promised. Useless tool and would recommend avoiding at all costs.

Review.Titre: It doesn’t work, for me at least.
Review.Contenu: I’m saddened to be writing this however I’m exasperated now. I’m in my second month and have only managed to unfollow about 200 accounts despite trying every which way- adding to existing list, adding to new list, adding 10 at a time, adding 30, 50. Even if it appears to work I go to Twitter and there’s no members on the list I’ve created. I forgot to cancel my subscription and am on my second month, but now the app is saying I’m on the free version and suggesting I upgrade. The only things that have given them two stars instead of one are the support message responses on Twitter and the cool visuals when you’re waiting for the app to analyse the data. Unfortunately it hasn’t worked for me at all.

Review.Titre: Wanted to set up a quick twitter feed…
Review.Contenu: Wanted to set up a quick twitter feed for RSS for myself. Felt lead to believe that this service didn't need a subscription (including in blog posts etc). Service needed 15 dollar a month subscription.I used dlvr.it instead - they let you post 50 posts a month (2 per day) for free - thereafter 10 dollars a month - still too expensive. Will report progress.

Not too bad of a tool but two big things (in my opinion) to be wary about before purchasing a subscription: 1. It only shows 3200 of your latest tweets and doesn’t go back any further. So if you tweeted 3200 times within the last year and want to see tweets further back than a year, you can’t. It doesn’t matter if you have deleted those 3200 tweets or not, the next 3200 don't appear.2. If you upload your Twitter archive file you aren’t able to preview your filtered tweets before deleting them.Edited to add: To be fair the customer service team was great when I spoke to them via Twitter DM.
Very helpful, I'd love to know where my followers are in the world though

Review.Titre: Its pretty good and it helped me a lot
Review.Contenu: Its pretty good and it helped me a lot. Thanks!

I was super excited to use their service. However when I went to pay for their subscription. They only allowed annual subscription pay. I was charged $200 instead of the $17.99/month that was on the promotion and was not able to get a refund. I hadn't even used their service for a month.Their website is so confusing to navigate - I couldn't even find how to cancel my subscription or to contact support.Save yourself the headache. Stay away from this website.Update: June 21 2023I was able to reach out to their support team and get a partial refund and a switch to a monthly subscription instead.

The program shows you who has followed or unfollowed you, provides thorough account metrics, and allows you to delete likes, tweets, and retweets in bulk without having to browse through them individually. They also don't spam your feed with obnoxious links. I use it solely for my Twitter.. very good app

And also the pricing of Circleboom is a bit higher for me compared to other similar software I have used in the past. But they have few features that other don't have and I love it.

Review.Titre: Circleboom has been a practical tool…
Review.Contenu: Circleboom has been a practical tool for my small business. The user interface is straightforward, making it easy to manage social media tasks. While it's helpful for content scheduling, I've found the analytics features on Twitter followers to be a bit basic. The support options are accessible, and the overall design is decent. It's worth considering if you're seeking a straightforward social media management solution.

I have used numerous management programs before, but this is the first time I've encountered something like Circleboom. It surpasses its competitors in terms of interface and usability. I was thoroughly satisfied during my time using it.

Circleboom has been a game-changer for me as a small business owner. The user-friendly interface and efficient content scheduling simplify social media management. I appreciate its analytics insights on Twitter followers, helping me maintain an authentic audience. Quick access to support and visually pleasing design make Circleboom a must-try tool. Highly recommended!

Circleboom has significantly eased the management of my online presence. Its straightforward interface simplifies social media tasks, making it a valuable asset. While the analytics for Twitter followers are basic, the platform excels in seamless content scheduling. With accessible support options and a decent overall design, Circleboom emerges as a reliable choice for simplifying social media management.

Circleboom's Twitter tool remains among the solid ones left after big updates on the APIs of X, or ex-Twitter, to delete tweets, see unfollowers, conduct detailed account searches, and even export accounts.It also has a comprehensive social media management tool and it offers a lot too. Connecting RSS feeds, finding articles, creating calendars and scheduling posts based on the best times to post on each platform, using built-in Canva and OpenAI functions... It has all a social media enthusiast can ask for.

I've been using circleboom for quite a long time until I stopped using twitter for personal reasons. I was running quite a big account, and circleboom was always in my tabs to update me about my followers and track them so it helped me through the safety of people around me in social media. Keeping track of my tweet engagements and deciding when would be the best time to post one as well as tweets where I mistakenly put out. Overall 5/5 and would heavily recommend.

Review.Titre: How I met Circleboom and why I really love it
Review.Contenu: Twitter is my favorite social media. I love to share my stories there and build relationships with new people. But sometimes, there are some mutuals that have been inactive for a long time or turn out to be fake accounts and that's not a small number. So I need to find tools that can track these accounts so that I only follow real people who are active. That's where I met CircleBoom. A twitter management tool that enables me to grow and strengthen my twitter account. That way, I can effectively and practically build connections with new people. I really love this tool ❤️

I’ve been searching for an app that can unfollow some dead accounts on twitter and so far, CircleBoom satisfied me the most. There are also tools that are centered on different elements of a profile such as followers, tweets, scheduling and more. The best app I have ever had ❤️

As a small business owner, this tool is helpful, easy to use, and most importantly, I do not have to worry about posting time on my social media accounts. Dealing with one less thing helps me focus on other and more important stuff. Would recommend to anyone who wants some help on their social media accounts.

Review.Titre: great tool to schedule posts and…
Review.Contenu: great tool to schedule posts and content curation tool comes quite handy. and offer useful inisights on Twitter follower growth and demographics. if you are social media manager with multiple account at hand, you should try it.

Circleboom is great for companies, streamers, influencers, and content creaters because of its easy to use interface and effectiveness on social media managing. I use both Twitter Management and Publish Tool. Twitter tool make it easier to have an insight about my followers and I can also search according to interests and hashtags. Tweet delete is the one I use most. There are tons of useful features and analytics to grow my social media. The only bad thing is its old interface but they will probably change it soon.On the other hand, Circleboom Publish is amazing since it gives me all the place to organize all of my social media. I can schedule my future posts and even connect rss feeds. I can share to multiple accounts with just one click. There are almost limitless options for posting.The last extension with the chat GPT ai post creator improved it to anotler level. It is a real time saver and totally entertaining to manage my social media accounts.

The interface is cool. I can track my social media's activities and insights through this app, and I was also able to find inactive and bots Twitter followers. It is easy to use and in case you are having a hard time, their help button and manual can be found immediately and would be a great help. The visuals are nice to the eyes and it piques my interest with this app. Thank you Circleboom.

As someone who has several accounts on social media, I need an application that can help me to manage the several social media accounts that I have. Luckily I know Circleboom, so it really helps me in planning, scheduling, and publishing my content without the hassle of doing it one by one. Besides that, I have an old twitter account, with posts that I think are past, and I'd like to delete them. Grateful I found Circleboom so it really helped me to delete all the old tweets that I had made and make my twitter account fresh again as before. Let's start a fun day!Thank you Circleboom, it really helped me a lot!

Review.Titre: I had cancelled my card and thought…
Review.Contenu: I first rated the product 1 star. This was because they charged me even though I had stopped using the service. I contacted support and they first said that they were unable to refund me and that they would keep the 215.88 dollars for a one year subscription that I had not used and will not use. I managed to persuade the support eventually to give me back 180.89 dollars because they were able to change my subscription from a one year to a monthly subscription and were successfully able to refund me for the remaining 11 months that had not started. I am thankful for this compromise because I needed the money.

The best experience of twitter and all the management tools are here with all the best feature such: provides Twitter account analytics, follower/friends insights, tools to find fakes, spammers, inactive accounts, and smart search tools to find new peers.And it used built-in tools to delete your Twitter likes, tweets, retweets or the whole Twitter archive of yours.Everything you need for a twitter management and analytics is here!!

Review.Titre: Circleboom enables me to use Twitter…
Review.Contenu: Circleboom enables me to use Twitter more effectively and more usefully. I got rid of spam accounts thanks to it. I can easily delete all my unwanted posts. Managing my social media accounts is easier with circleboom.

Review.Titre: Circleboom is an amazing tool for…
Review.Contenu: Circleboom is an amazing tool for managing and growing your Twitter presence. It has a range of features that make it easy to engage with your followers, schedule tweets, and analyze your performance.One of the things I love most about Circleboom is the user interface. It's clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate, even for those who are new to Twitter management tools.Another great feature of Circleboom is its scheduling functionality. You can easily schedule tweets in advance, so you can be active on Twitter even when you're not online. This is a great way to make sure your content is being seen by your followers.Overall, I highly recommend Circleboom for anyone looking to grow their Twitter presence and engage with their followers. It's a powerful and user-friendly tool that has helped me significantly improve my Twitter strategy.

So much love to Circleboom!
